text: The UK is the first country to approve after clinical trials the Pfizer/BioNtech #COVID19 #vaccine, and vaccinations are expected to start early next week. At 610 @CBCKW891, @JohnAshmore #ukpoli tells us about the reaction in Britain. LISTEN LIVE: https://t.co/J0xDEi016K https://t.co/4M943iB16K
